Clikman Productions

About Clikman

Clikman Production is the brainchild of Everest summiteer and Award-winning filmmaker, Samir Jung Thapa. What started as passion for adventure photography has now flourished into documentary filmmaking and photography.

Now Clikman Production has made its mark in photography to documentary filmmaking. Working extensively in environment sector â€“ from climate change to wildlife, covering humanitarian works in Nepal and on International grounds. We take pride in our expertise, our partners and are well equipped for all filmmaking and photography needs.

Clikman works with well-recognized Institutions around the globe. To name a few - World Wildlife Fund (WWF), United Nations (UN) agencies like Unicef, BALLY Switzerland, USAID, International Center for Integrated Mountain Development (ICIMOD), Asian Development Bank (ADB), ICCO Cooperation, and SNV Netherlands Development Organization.

Professionals in documentary filmmaking, drone permits, fixing services, short films, photography, animations, Infographics, sound and music scores
